body.p: I see that George Pope has got into a difficulty him and his mother formerly belonged to Robert Stewart which is my uncle a better set of negros could not be found they always was found honest and upright. I think it is hard that his old mother should be deprived of her only support for others meaness Gentleman please give the boy Justice I have known him from infancy to the present day and never heard anything against him befor

Yours Respectifully
Mrs Susan. J. Stewart
